### Water Transportation Services and Supply

#### Solicitation Overview

* Solicitation Number: T1610-230011
* Date Published: February 20, 2024
* Date of Expiration: March 15, 2024 (Closed)

#### Project Description

Transport Canada is seeking a Contractor to provide safe and efficient water transportation services for Marine Safety Inspectors (MSI) to vessels in the Saint John Harbour, New Brunswick, and its environs. The Contractor is responsible for supplying labour, materials, equipment, and supervision to perform the necessary work as outlined in Annex A - Statement of Work.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contract Details

* Duration: April 1, 2024 - March 31, 2026, with options for two additional one-year extensions
* Geographic Location: Saint John Harbour, New Brunswick

#### Evaluation and Selection

The Contractor's bid must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive. The bid with the lowest price will be recommended for award.

#### Contact Information

For more information and to obtain the solicitation package, please visit the following links:

* English (English only): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32253/t1610-230011-rfp_water-transportation-services.pdf>
* French (French only): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32253/t1610-230011-ddp_services-relies-au-transport-maritime_2.pdf>, <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32253/t1610-230011-ddp_services-de-transport-maritime.pdf>
